title: Dataproc - 2.1.x release versions
abstract:
# Dataproc - 2.1.x release versions
**Note:** See [Note 1](#note_1) for ARM image component information.
| Component        | 2.1.43-debian11/-ubuntu20/-ubuntu20-arm/-rocky8 2024/03/14 | 2.1.42-debian11/-ubuntu20/-ubuntu20-arm/-rocky8 2024/03/06 | 2.1.41-debian11/-ubuntu20/-ubuntu20-arm/-rocky8 2024/02/28 | 2.1.40-debian11/-ubuntu20/-ubuntu20-arm/-rocky8 2024/02/08 | 2.1.39-debian11/-ubuntu20/-ubuntu20-arm/-rocky8 2024/02/01 |
|:-----------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------|
| Apache Atlas initialization action  | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              |
| Apache Flink optional component   | 1.15.4              | 1.15.4              | 1.15.4              | 1.15.4              | 1.15.4              |
| Apache Hadoop installed     | 3.3.6              | 3.3.6              | 3.3.6              | 3.3.6              | 3.3.6              |
| Apache Hive installed     | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              |
| Apache Hive WebHCat optional component | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              | 3.1.3              |
| Apache Hudi optional component   | 0.12.3              | 0.12.3              | 0.12.3              | 0.12.3              | 0.12.3              |
| Apache Kafka initialization action  | 3.1.0              | 3.1.0              | 3.1.0              | 3.1.0              | 3.1.0              |
| Apache Pig installed      | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT            | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT            | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT            | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT            | 0.18.0-SNAPSHOT            |
| Apache Spark installed     | 3.3.2              | 3.3.2              | 3.3.2              | 3.3.2              | 3.3.2              |
| Apache Sqoop initialization action  | 1.5.0-SNAPSHOT            | 1.5.0-SNAPSHOT            | 1.5.0-SNAPSHOT            | 1.5.0-SNAPSHOT            | 1.5.0-SNAPSHOT            |
| Apache Tez installed      | 0.10.2              | 0.10.2              | 0.10.2              | 0.10.2              | 0.10.2              |
| BigQuery Connector initialization action | 0.27.1              | 0.27.1              | 0.27.1              | 0.27.1              | 0.27.1              |
| Cloud Storage Connector installed  | hadoop3-2.2.20            | hadoop3-2.2.20            | hadoop3-2.2.19            | hadoop3-2.2.19            | hadoop3-2.2.19            |
| Conscrypt installed      | 2.5.2              | 2.5.2              | 2.5.2              | 2.5.2              | 2.5.2              |
| Docker optional component    | 20.10              | 20.10              | 20.10              | 20.10              | 20.10              |
| Hue initialization action    | 4.10.0              | 4.10.0              | 4.10.0              | 4.10.0              | 4.10.0              |
| Java installed       | 11               | 11               | 11               | 11               | 11               |
| JupyterLab Notebook optional component | 3.4               | 3.4               | 3.4               | 3.4               | 3.4               |
| Oozie initialization action    | 5.2.1              | 5.2.1              | 5.2.1              | 5.2.1              | 5.2.1              |
| Python installed       | Python 3.10             | Python 3.10             | Python 3.10             | Python 3.10             | Python 3.10             |
| R installed        | R 4.1              | R 4.1              | R 4.1              | R 4.1              | R 4.1              |
| Ranger optional component    | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              | 2.2.0              |
| Scala installed       | 2.12.18              | 2.12.18              | 2.12.18              | 2.12.18              | 2.12.18              |
| Solr optional component     | 9.0.0              | 9.0.0              | 9.0.0              | 9.0.0              | 9.0.0              |
| Trino optional component     | 376               | 376               | 376               | 376               | 376               |
| Zeppelin Notebook optional component  | 0.10.1              | 0.10.1              | 0.10.1              | 0.10.1              | 0.10.1              |
| Zookeeper optional component    | 3.8.3              | 3.8.3              | 3.8.3              | 3.8.3              | 3.8.3              |
**Notes:**  [](None)
- [2.1.x-*-arm images](/dataproc/docs/concepts/compute/supported-machine-types#arm_machine_types) support only the installed components and the following optional components (the remaining 2.1 optional components and all initialization actions are unsupported):- Apache Hive WebHCat
- Docker
- Zookeeper (installed in [HA clusters](/dataproc/docs/concepts/configuring-clusters/high-availability) ; optional component in non-HA clusters)
- Apache Hive installations on Dataproc clusters include [HCatalog](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HCatalog) , but do not include [Hive WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) (see the [Hive WebHCat Optional Component](/dataproc/docs/concepts/components/hivewebhcat) to install Hive WebHCat on a cluster).
- The [Presto Optional Component](/dataproc/docs/concepts/components/presto is available as [Trino Optional Component](/dataproc/docs/concepts/components/trino) in 2.1 and later image versions.
- The HBase and Druid components are not supported in 2.1 and later image versions.
- The source code to image 2.1 libraries that are licensed under Reciprocal and Restricted licenses is available at the`/usr/local/share/google/dataproc/third-party-sources`filepath on Dataproc cluster VMs
